Title: Sins of the Past
Plot: Xena battles an evil warlord, a vengeful Cyclops and harsh weather during her journey home to Amphipolis, where she's joined by a young woman named Gabrielle, who's a resourceful young protege.
GuestStars: Jay Laga'aia, Stephen Hall, Linda Jones, Geoff Snell, Anton Bentley, Patrick Wilson, Wally Green, Roydon Muir, Huntly Eliott, Winston Harris, David Perrett
